page.title: 15LOCAL PLANTS AND ANIMALS
page.content: In our area there are Badgers.The entrance to their set is about 50cm.The Badgers live in the carpark over the road from our school.We planted some trees there about 5 years ago.Many birds come and settle near our school.We have seen woodpigeon,rooks,crows,blackbirds,jays and most of the tit family. Sparrows,chaffinches and house-martins are the most common. There are many fields where hares, rabbits and foxes live. We have many different kinds of plants in our area on which many insects and birds live.There are many trees that shed blossom mostly white. There are trees like Lime, sycamore,hawthorn,oak,beech and elderberry and many more trees.The trees are growing in the area which used to be the Forest of Arden.
